title: Husky Game Development | Logo Design
description:
Here is a logo I designed for Husky Game Development. I wanted to keep it sleek and modern, as well as give some symbolism of game development.
Created with Adobe Illustrator

title: BOSS Snowplow | Web Design
description: As part of my internship, I was tasked with designing an internal web app capable of sending and receiving data similar to the old version, all while giving it a makeover. Created with Angular 4, Typescript, Adobe Illustrator, ASP.Net/C#

title: Creative Suite 155 | Graphic Design
description: These are several posters and materials I designed while on my on-campus job. Created with Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe InDesign

title: Coney Dog Games | Marketing Design
description: Here is the logo and business card design I created for Coney Dog Games. It gives homage to the classic Detroit Coney Dog with a pinup cartoon style. Created with Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe InDesign

title: Bonzai Brawl | T-Shirt Design
description: Here is a t-shirt design I did for the Bonzai Brawl 2018 AI Programming Competition. It resembles Yin and Yang through water and fire. Created with Adobe Illustrator

title: El Zagal | Web Design
description: This is a website I did for El Zagal Shriners, located in Fargo, ND. Located at elzagal.orgCreated with Adobe Illustrator, Wordpress, and Sass
